name: Toki Pona Pal
description:
Toki Pona is a constructed language by linguist Sonja Lang. This is a helper-app with flash cards, a dictionary, and comics.

Features

Toki Pona Pal is a simple application designed for people interested in the Toki Pona constructed language. Features include:

  • Dictionary (English <-> Toki Pona)
  • Flash Cards (English <-> Toki Pona)
  • A few simple comics in Toki Pona
Moosader
